verbs.description: i [V: did] n’t use any heat on my hair for 2 weeks after a bad hair dye experience i 'll try anything to improve the condition of my hair i stopped using hot tools on my hair and it made a huge difference morrocan argan oil curlier waves jennifer aniston ogx bobby
